html:
I got reborn in blooming flowers
They bloomed just for this occasion
While skylarks were chirping
I got assembled
Assembled out of soil, air and water
Brought to life by the love of God
And the sun was full of faith and hope
And my eyes opened again
So I thanked God with full heart
And got stroked by happiness
Because of all the wonderful people
And all hearts got filled with joy
As an act of celestial wisdom
I live again
In a world better then ever
Thanks to celestial wisdom
title: Reborn
